# List of Zites: Search Engines | [[zite-list-searches-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that index content or other sites / zites can be classified as search engines.

**[Kaffiene Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/).**  
Kaffiene Search is a zite that allows users to search an index of predefined sites for keywords and other terms. Kaffiene Search provides such features as browsing the zite through a proxy and listings sorted by peer popularity count.  
  * Zite Address:   1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search), 
ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: 
kaffiene.bit, search.kaffie.bit

**[ZeroSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit).**  
ZeroSearch is the original implementation of a search engine to Zeronet. Visitors are allowed to submit their zite.  
  * Zite Address:   1ZeroeuDnL2jNS6t1epQa1SPvC91KG8ER  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, 
ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topics:5_1PNyuY1iZqXBpft4ArouqcnE4pNRGYij5i/ZeroSearch+bit+sub+topic)  
  * Zite Domain: 
zerosearch.bit 

**[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/).**  
CensoredSearch is a search engine that uses an index of clearnet sites that allows visitors to use search terms of specific sites. The source of these sites have been gathered through various News sources so website blocking of specific sites can vary by region. The zite also provides a page that offers multiple ways to bypass website censorship efforts.  
  * Zite Address:   1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search+bit), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search), 
ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain: 
censoredsearch.bit  

[Fuji - Free & Cloneable](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AWAXiVLbcuncGbpyiUmDbAUpBB4r6KPKL/)

[ZSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NnopBFkeLnBUSAwcvxPCizSaqEnHFcEPH/)

[ZeroExpose Search Engine](http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/) (Tor onion service)

**[RVRE](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).**  
RVRE is a simple search engine that allows anyone to search through an index of zites.
  * Zite Address:   1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF
  * Zite Domain: 
bwoi.bit

# List of Zites: Search Engines | [[zite-list-searches-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that index content or other sites / zites can be classified as search engines.

**[Kaffiene Search](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit/).**  
Kaffiene Search is a zite that allows users to search an index of predefined sites for keywords and other terms. Kaffiene Search provides such features as browsing the zite through a proxy and listings sorted by peer popularity count.  
  * Zite Address:   1Mr5rX9TauvaGReB4RjCaE6D37FJQaY5Ba  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:1_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search),

  * Zite Domain: 
kaffiene.bit, search.kaffie.bit

**[ZeroSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit).**  
ZeroSearch is the original implementation of a search engine to Zeronet. Visitors are allowed to submit their zite.  
  * Zite Address:   1ZeroeuDnL2jNS6t1epQa1SPvC91KG8ER  
  * Zite Discussion:

ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topics:5_1PNyuY1iZqXBpft4ArouqcnE4pNRGYij5i/ZeroSearch+bit+sub+topic)  
  * Zite Domain: 
zerosearch.bit 

**[CensoredSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T/).**  
CensoredSearch is a search engine that uses an index of clearnet sites that allows visitors to use search terms of specific sites. The source of these sites have been gathered through various News sources so website blocking of specific sites can vary by region. The zite also provides a page that offers multiple ways to bypass website censorship efforts.  
  * Zite Address:   1LC3ryygCrv94ZK4Nk8ELW6vE1hKwopE8T  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao/Censored+Search+bit),

ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain: 
censoredsearch.bit

[ZSearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NnopBFkeLnBUSAwcvxPCizSaqEnHFcEPH/)

**[Bwoi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).**  
Bwoi is a simple search engine that allows anyone to search through an index of zites.
  * Zite Address:   1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF
  * Zite Domain: 
bwoi.bit

# Bwoi

Bwoi is a search engine written by LetsRaceBwoi located at [bwoi.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).

## Developer
The creator and developer of Bwoi is LetsRaceBwoi.  His ZeroID is Bwoi.  He can be found on various other sites, such as Discord (LetsRaceBwoi) and Twitter [@LetsRaceBwoi](http://www.twitter.com/letsracebwoi/).

## See also
* [[Kaffiene]]
* [[Kidsearch]]
* [[ZeroSearch]]
* [[Zearch]]

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*.

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit).

## List of working proxies

- https://bit.no.com:43110/
- https://www.zeropro.xyz/ (TLS certificate expired)
- http://zerowrohotccypak.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])

## List of meta proxies

What's meta proxy? See [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ)

- https://zero.acelewis.com/

## List of broken proxies

***These proxies do not work anymore.***

- https://proxy1.zn.kindlyfire.me/
- https://proxy2.zn.kindlyfire.me/
- http://wrewolf.com:43110/ (0.4.0, supports ZeroMe)
- http://proxy.zeroexpose.com/
- http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zero.pags.to:43110/
- https://zeroproxy.atomike.ninja/
- http://zerobit.io:43110/
- http://epdb6k6hj4rttycg.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zeronet.crypt.cat:8080/

# Bwoi

Bwoi is a music sharing platform built from the Bwoi search engine.  It is currently a work-in-progress site.

You can find Bwoi at [bwoi.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).

## Features

Some of Bwoi's features include:

## Developer
The creator and developer of Bwoi is LetsRaceBwoi.  His ZeroID is Bwoi.  He can be found on various other sites, such as Discord (LetsRaceBwoi) and Twitter [@LetsRaceBwoi](http://www.twitter.com/letsracebwoi/).

# Welcome to ZeroWiki!

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*

# Welcome to ZeroWiki !

[[ZeroWiki]] is a wiki platform for [[ZeroNet]], the distributed web network based on [[Bittorrent]], [[Bitcoin]] and [[Tor]]. 

[[ZeroWiki]] is public, [[cloning|clonable]] and editable. Wikis can be used for taking notes, storing snippets, sharing knowledge by creating [[FAQ]]s and documentations, keeping track of your goals, or as a simple to-do lists. See the [[help|help page]] for a more in-depth view of how it works.

## Useful pages

- [[zeronet|What is ZeroNet?]]
- [[zite|What is a "zite"?]]
- [[ZeroWiki:Format|ZeroWiki writing format]]
- [[List of Zites]]
- [[Dev ideas|Development ideas]]
- [[proxies|List of proxies, allowing you to view ZeroNet from clearnet]]

*Please note that [[ZeroWiki]] is still beta software, it may have bugs and lack some features. [[ZeroWiki:Issues|Propose features and report bugs here]].*

# List of Zites: Media | [[zite-list-media-talk|Talk]]

### Zites that provide media including movies, music, applications, books, can be considered media zites.

[peer-to-peer]: [[peer-to-peer]]

**[Microsoft MSDN Software Archive](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG/).**  
This archive is a collection of MSDN Software taken from the Microsoft site, This zite uses Mega.nz links to provide content to visitors.  
  * Zite Address:   1AJB5rtjfB9imjDGVk5vtRtZp3zgYizbpG  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:6_1BDapygZHNG8GxEuSsEpK9Xipm9mFfW1F2/isolinks+Official+Microsoft+MSDN+Software), ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[Play Torrents](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/).**  
Play Torrents is a zite that combines a beautiful user interface with move releases sourced from RARBG. The zite provides color coded ratings, movie trailers, and magnet links of various qualities. **Be aware that magnet links operate off of the [peer-to-peer] swarm and downloading media through this zite is just as easily monitored as The Pirate Bay**  
  * Zite Address:   1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: playmovies.bit (unconfirmed)

**[Zero Torrents](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/).**  
ZeroTorrent is a file-sharing zite that works off of the ZeroTalk platform. The zite allows any visitor with a ZeroID to publish links to magnet files, post comments, cast votes, and also provides categories and a search feature. **Be aware that magnet links operate off of the [peer-to-peer] swarm and downloading media through this zite is just as easily monitored as The Pirate Bay**  
  * Zite Address:   192dZ1EG5tU7PnCfuwGMDEBrr2eLqvs4t3  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:44_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroTorrent), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:3_1HcK5Hw1rPZeYdgTmqJGrVG2tSyR9Ke2Gt/ZeroTorrent), 
ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: ZeroTorrent.bit

**[NullFolder : To download and upload the files via BitTorrent trackers](/1GrtBsG57kjU2Z3iAQebG9D5c8CRDRLoPj/files.html)**

**[FasCast](/1qJ3EM5rTa2wPTBvJuCFjdLXjrBCgBkR8/videos/sintel.html)**
- Media player
- Media content sharing

**[Bwoi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).**  
Bwoi is a music search engine built with a beautiful user interface. Bwoi was originally a search engine indexing zites, but has since been modified to show the capabilities of the Bwoi engine.  Users can upload tracks as well as listen to those uploaded by others.
  * Zite Address:   1f7FYxZWSZ5YG7Nd8sGsHcWEQgvdnVvQF  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List,
ZeroCentral, 
ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain: 
bwoi.bit  

**[NinjaBeats](http://127.0.0.1:43110/15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk/).**  
NinjaBeats is a site with a well-defined user interface, built using the Kaffiene search engine.
  * Zite Address:   15F9LYs6c17NUXv3MxpJSGbpWxyHTEbzMk
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List,
ZeroCentral, 
ZeroTalk,  
  * Zite Domain:

# Bwoi

Bwoi is one of many ZeroNet search engines.  It uses a modern theme, with some aspects from Google and Bing (such as Google's search bar, and Bing's 'daily wallpaper'), along with a plethora of features.

You can find Bwoi at [bwoi.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/bwoi.bit/).

## Features

Some of Bwoi's features include:
* Multiple pages
* Many search results
* Installable on Chrome (and soon other popular web browsers)
* Support for anybody who wishes to clone the site
* Support for multiple sources simoutaneously or individually
* Relevance result ordering

## Developer
The creator and developer of Bwoi is LetsRaceBwoi.  His ZeroID is Bwoi.  He can be found on various other sites, such as Discord (LetsRaceBwoi) and Twitter [@LetsRaceBwoi](http://www.twitter.com/letsracebwoi/).

Some of Bwoi's features include:
* Multiple pages
* Many search results
* Installable on Chrome (and soon other popular web browsers)
* Support for anybody who wishes to clone the site

* Relevance result ordering
